title: Budafok, Hungary
marks: Signature, Title, Date and Inscription on back, in pencil: [Budafok / 1919 / Hungary / A.
description: village with many gable-roofed buildings; woman in a long dress at left in a small courtyard; three figures - two lying on blankets - on berms near center with two other figures - one seated - near far edge of berms; small road in upper right corner with walking figures
